contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1945 D Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class A)
Belle Vue Marching Contest (Class A) 10 March Contest (Music and Inspection Points) Belle Vue Marching Contest belle-vue-marching-contest
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and cup, 2nd £20, 3rd £8, 4th £5. 5 bands competed.
Aug. 29, 2015, 9:46 a.m. June 8, 2018, 7:44 a.m.
1 Barrow Shipyard Band Unknown
2 Horwich RMI Unknown March: Raby
3 Sheffield Transport Department William Foster March: Brilliant
4 City of Manchester Unknown March: The Thin Red Line
5 Gorton British Railways Unknown
Withdrawn Salford Air Raid Wardens Corps Unknown
